DOC.brief_summary: The aim study prospectively investigate diagnostic performance potential radiation dose reduction coronary artery calcium score use new tin filter system 3rd generation DSCT scanner .
DOC.criteria: Subject must 1990 year age . Subject must refer clinically indicated coronary artery calcium scan and/or coronary CT angiography TRO scan coronary artery calcium score . Subject must provide write informed consent prior studyrelated procedure perform . Subject must willing comply clinical study procedure . Subject pregnant nursing female . Exclude possibility pregnancy : By test ( urine BHCG ) within 24 hour scan , By surgical sterilization , Post menopausal , minimum one ( 1 ) year history without menses . Subject acute psychiatric disorder cognitively impaired . Subject use dependent substance abuse . Subject unwilling comply requirement protocol . Subject acute unstable condition .
